item.description:
"The shot heard around the World"
Where once embattled framers stood.
70 Patriots marched against 800 British Redcoats.
Concord Green
Lexington, Massachusetts
1775 234 years ago Our ForeFathers Fought For Our Freedom.

http://www.youtube.co...

Come join us April 19th on Lexington green. Let this be the day that you stand up and say "No more!" Everyone is welcome to join us. For more information, please visit www.oath-keepers.blogspot.com

If you are unable to make it to the Oathkeepers event, check out the appleseed events all across the nation

The battle
